channel.title: The diary of Samuel Pepys
channel.description:
This series dramatizes portions of the diary of Samuel Pepys, an English naval administrator who provided invaluable writings from the English Restoration period.

An online collection of early educational public radio content from the National Association of Educational Broadcasters (NAEB).

item.title: Chapter eight
item.description: This program presents dramatizations of portions of the diary of seventeenth century naval administrator, Samuel Pepys.
item.dc:creator: University of Missouri at Kansas City
item.dc:subject: Pepys, Samuel, 1633-1703--Drama.
